channel.title: Comments on: Google Base Launched

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I have no idea. I think I read his bio once, but I don't even remember if the reason was there.
item.content:encoded: I have no idea. I think I read his bio once, but I don’t even remember if the reason was there.
